net.blitzcube.peapi.api.entity

Interface IEntityIdentifier


  • public interface IEntityIdentifier
    Since:
    2018-02-23
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WeakReference<org.bukkit.entity.Entity> getEntity()
      Gets the reference to the entity that this identifier identifies.
      int getEntityID()
      Gets the entity ID that is associated with this identifier.
      WeakReference<IFakeEntity> getFakeEntity()
      Gets the reference to the fake entity that this identifier identifies.
      WeakReference<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getNear()
      Gets the reference to the player that this identifier was constructed for.
      UUID getUUID()
      Gets the UUID that is associated with this identifier.
      boolean isFakeEntity()
      Returns whether or not this entity is a fake entity.
      void moreSpecific()
      Attempts to find more information about the entity that this identifies.

    • Method Detail

      • moreSpecific

        void moreSpecific()
        Attempts to find more information about the entity that this identifies. For example, if the identifier was created by a packet, it will contain the entity ID but not the entity or fake entity object. Calling this method will lookup entities with a matching ID and update the references.

      • getEntityID

        int getEntityID()
        Gets the entity ID that is associated with this identifier. This is never undefined.
        Returns:
        the entity ID associated with this identifier

      • getUUID

        UUID getUUID()
        Gets the UUID that is associated with this identifier. This may be null if the identifier was constructed by a packet listener, in which case we have no information about the entity that the ID belongs to. We can attempt to find this if it is not present by using moreSpecific()
        Returns:
        the UUID of the entity that this is associated with

      • getNear

        WeakReference<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getNear()
        Gets the reference to the player that this identifier was constructed for. This will be null unless the identifier was retrieved from a packet event, in which case it will be the player that the event is being fired for.
        Returns:
        the Player that this identifier was created for

      • getEntity

        WeakReference<org.bukkit.entity.Entity> getEntity()
        Gets the reference to the entity that this identifier identifies. This may be null if the identifier was constructed by a packet listener, in which case we have no information about the entity that the ID belongs to. We can attempt to find this if it is not present by using moreSpecific()
        If this is a fake entity, this value will be null.
        Returns:
        the entity that this identifier is referencing

      • getFakeEntity

        WeakReference<IFakeEntity> getFakeEntity()
        Gets the reference to the fake entity that this identifier identifies. This may be null if the identifier was constructed by a packet listener, in which case we have no information about the entity that the ID belongs to. We can attempt to find this if it is not present by using moreSpecific()
        If this is a real entity, this value will be null.
        Returns:
        the fake entity that this identifier is referencing.

      • isFakeEntity

        boolean isFakeEntity()
        Returns whether or not this entity is a fake entity.
        Returns:
        whether or not this is a fake entity
